select A.* from ( select T.*, (select C.CNTRCT_TYPE from auditcntrct C where C.CNTRCT_NO = T.CNTRCT_NO and C.DELETE_FLG = '1') as CNTRCT_TYPE from audit T where 1 = 1

select DISTINCT CNTRCT_NM from audit where DELETE_FLG = '1'
PROJECT_MANAGER in ($PROJECT_MANAGER$)
DOC_REC_DATE >= #START_DATE#
DOC_REC_DATE <= #END_DATE#
and DOC_REC_DATE is not null order by CNTRCT_NM

select DISTINCT CNTRCT_NM from auditcntrct where DELETE_FLG = '1' and CNTRCT_TYPE = '2' and SUBSTR(CNTRCT_INFO,5) = 1
PROJECT_SENIOR_MANAGER in ($PROJECT_MANAGER$)
CNTRCT_ST_DATE >= #START_DATE#
CNTRCT_ED_DATE <= #END_DATE#
order by CNTRCT_NM

select A.* from ( select DATE_FORMAT(DOC_REC_DATE,'%Y.%m') AS showtime, CNTRCT_NM AS CNTRCT_NM, COUNT(CNTRCT_NM) AS CNTRCT_NM_COUNT from audit where DELETE_FLG = '1'
PROJECT_MANAGER in ($PROJECT_MANAGER$)
DOC_REC_DATE >= #START_DATE#
DOC_REC_DATE <= #END_DATE#
) A group by A.showtime order by A.showtime

select PROJECT_MANAGER, DATE_FORMAT(DOC_REC_DATE,'%Y.%m') AS DOC_REC_DATE_MONTH, CNTRCT_NM AS CNTRCT_NM, COUNT(CNTRCT_NM) AS CNTRCT_NM_COUNT from audit where DELETE_FLG = '1'
CNTRCT_INFO = #CNTRCT_INFO#
PROJECT_MANAGER in ($PROJECT_MANAGER$)
DOC_REC_DATE >= #START_DATE#
DOC_REC_DATE <= #END_DATE#
and DOC_REC_DATE is not null group by PROJECT_MANAGER, DOC_REC_DATE_MONTH, CNTRCT_NM order by PROJECT_MANAGER, DOC_REC_DATE_MONTH, CNTRCT_NM

select PROJECT_MANAGER, DATE_FORMAT(DOC_REC_DATE,'%Y.%m') AS DOC_REC_DATE_MONTH, COUNT(CNTRCT_NM) AS MONTH_ALL_COUNT from audit where DELETE_FLG = '1'

DOC_REC_DATE >= #START_DATE#
DOC_REC_DATE <= #END_DATE#
and DOC_REC_DATE is not null group by PROJECT_MANAGER, DOC_REC_DATE_MONTH order by PROJECT_MANAGER, DOC_REC_DATE_MONTH

select PROJECT_MANAGER, CNTRCT_NM AS CNTRCT_NM, COUNT(CNTRCT_NM) AS CNTRCT_NM_COUNT, SUM(case when CNTRCT_INFO=4 then CNT_PRICE else VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT end) as VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, SUM(A_AMOUNT) as A_PER_AMOUNT, SUM(case when A_SET_DATE is not null then A_AMOUNT else 0 end) as A_AMOUNT, SUM(B_AMOUNT) as B_PER_AMOUNT, SUM(case when B_SET_DATE is not null then B_AMOUNT else 0 end) as B_AMOUNT from audit where DELETE_FLG = '1'
CNTRCT_INFO = #CNTRCT_INFO#
PROJECT_MANAGER in ($PROJECT_MANAGER$)
DOC_REC_DATE >= #START_DATE#
DOC_REC_DATE <= #END_DATE#
and DOC_REC_DATE is not null group by PROJECT_MANAGER, CNTRCT_NM order by PROJECT_MANAGER, CNTRCT_NM

select PROJECT_MANAGER, SUM(A_AMOUNT) + SUM(B_AMOUNT) as ALL_PER_AMOUNT, SUM(case when A_SET_DATE is not null then A_AMOUNT else 0 end) + SUM(case when B_SET_DATE is not null then B_AMOUNT else 0 end) as ALL_AMOUNT from audit where DELETE_FLG = '1'
CNTRCT_INFO = #CNTRCT_INFO#
PROJECT_MANAGER in ($PROJECT_MANAGER$)
DOC_REC_DATE >= #START_DATE#
DOC_REC_DATE <= #END_DATE#

CNTRCT_ST_DATE >= #START_DATE#
